description: The MDL_MD_PRBLM_LIST table enables you to report on Medication Problem List information.

columns.name: MED_PRBLM_LIST_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the med problem list record.

columns.name: RECORD_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Status of record:  1-inactive, 2-deleted, 4-hidden, 5-inactive and hidden, or 6-deleted and hidden.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Active


Inactive


Deleted


Inactive and Deleted


Hidden


Inactive and Hidden


Deleted and Hidden


Inactive Deleted and Hidden

columns.name: PATIENT_ID
columns.description: The Patient ID (EPT) with which this medication problem list (MDL) record is associated.

columns.name: CRRNT_LONG_TERM_YN
columns.description:
The current long-term status of this medication problem list (MDL) record.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: MEDICATION_NOTE_ID
columns.description: ID of the note (HNO). This note applies to all patient medications that share the same simple generic medication name.

columns.name: SOURCE_PAT_CID
columns.description: Source patient CID during patient merge in IntraConnect environments

columns.name: MED_ADHER_SCORE
columns.description: This item stores the most recently calculated medication adherence score for this simple generic. The adherence score is not updated in real time. If you need to ensure a current score for reporting on a population of patients and certain simple generics, you can use a registry with metric HFP 82099-Medication Adherence Score Data.

columns.name: MED_ADHER_CONF_C_NAME
columns.description:
Our confidence that the dispense data used to calculate the medication adherence score is a comprehensive list of dispenses.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Low


Moderate


High

columns.name: MED_ADHER_ACC_DTTM
columns.description: This item stores the instant that the current score is considered accurate. This is equivalent to the end of the period that we run medication adherence calculation.

columns.name: MED_ADHER_DAYSOWNED
columns.description: This item stores the number of days a patient is supposed to take medications related to this simple generic. This item is accurate to the current medication adherence score.

columns.name: MED_ADHER_COVERED
columns.description: This item stores the number of days that are covered by a patient's supply. Equivalently, it means the patient is being adherent on these days. This item is accurate with the current adherence score.

columns.name: MED_ADHER_HIDDEN_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the reason that the score is hidden.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


PRN


OTC


No Days Supplied

columns.name: MED_ADHER_INST_DTTM
columns.description: This item stores the calculation instant of the current adherence score.

columns.name: MED_ADHER_STRT_DATE
columns.description: This item sets the start date of the Medication adherence score measurement period

columns.name: MED_ADHER_ORD_INST_DTTM
columns.description: This item stores the earliest order instant used when calculating the adherence score.
